def close_and_finalize_polygon(image: np.ndarray, original_image: np.ndarray) -> None:
    if len(POLYGONS[-1]) > 2:
        cv2.line(
            img=image,
            pt1=POLYGONS[-1][-1],
            pt2=POLYGONS[-1][0],
            color=COLORS.by_idx(0).as_bgr(),
            thickness=THICKNESS,
        )
    POLYGONS.append([])
    image[:] = original_image.copy()
    redraw_polygons(image)
    cv2.imshow(WINDOW_NAME, image)
